DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective assess safety tolerability single repeat dos EMD525797 , characterize Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) . The secondary objective investigate immunogenicity Progressive disease ( PD ) , assess anti-tumor activity EMD525797 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study EMD525797 Solid Tumor Patients Japan
